sources.title: Great Guns! (1927)
sources.description: Oswald's country is at war, like many other volunters he joins the army and finds himself soon in the trenches. A short battle leaves him wounded, but at least in the field hospital where his girlfriend is working. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/great-guns-1927/

metadata.Plot: Oswald's country is at war, like many other volunters he joins the army and finds himself soon in the trenches. A short battle leaves him wounded, but at least in the field hospital where his girlfriend is working.
